   "source": [
    "import re\n",
    "def df2html(df):\n",
    "    shorter = df._repr_html_().replace(\"th>\\n\", \"th>\")\n",
    "    shorter = shorter.replace(\"<tr>\\n\", \"<tr>\")\n",
    "\n",
    "    shorter = shorter.replace(\"td>\\n\", \"td>\")\n",
    "    shorter = re.sub(\">[ \\t]+<\", \"><\", shorter)\n",
    "    print(shorter)"
   ]
  },

    "def df2html(df):\n",
    "    shorter = df.to_html().replace(\"th>\\n\", \"th>\")\n",
    "    shorter = shorter.replace(\"<tr>\\n\", \"<tr>\")\n",
    "\n",
    "    shorter = shorter.replace(\"td>\\n\", \"td>\")\n",
    "    shorter = re.sub(\">[ \\t]+<\", \"><\", shorter)\n",
    "    print(shorter)"
   ]
